dungeons_and_dragons.model

Class GamePlayModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • dungeons_and_dragons.model.GamePlayModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class GamePlayModel
extends Observable
implements Runnable
    Once GamePlayModel gets a change state query request from any view they respond to instructions to change the state from GamePlayController
    Author:
    Tejas Sadrani & Urmil Kansara & Mihir Pujara & Hirangi Naik
